title: Bug 18268 - Issue with finding images and files in NL-specific subdirectories
description: When following the steps to modify the about image in Eclipse, it seems that the UI correctly passes the entire path to IPluginDescriptor.find, but the '$nl$' path segment isn't handled properly. As a result, images and files in NL-specific subdirectories aren't being found.
OB: The about dialog doesn't display the main image when the path contains the '$nl$' segment, indicating an issue with handling NL-specific subdirectories.
EB: The about dialog should display the main image correctly even when the path contains the '$nl$' segment, indicating proper handling of NL-specific subdirectories.
SR: Move the file <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/eclipselg.gif to <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/nl/en/eclipselg.gif within an NL-specific subdirectory.
